channel.title: alla on iPardalis - Ambilobe Panther Chameleons for sale. Panther chameleons for sale near me.
channel.description: Recent content in alla on iPardalis - Ambilobe Panther Chameleons for sale. Panther chameleons for sale near me.

item.title: Nugget x Alla
item.description: This pairing is between our third generation hold back, Nugget, and our most successful female, Alla, from RB Barto @Panther Creek Chameleons. Nugget is one of my favorite yellow-bodied blue bar Ambilobe paired with an all-time great in JJ who comes from some of the most popular Ambilobe lines at Kammerflage Kreations.

item.title: Alfred
item.description: Alfred is an extreme outlier from the Jude x Alla pairing. We were lucky to keep him because he carries some vibrant, almost dark neon colors. His resting colors are some of the nicest I have ever seen in person and I am very excited to work with him moving forward!

item.title: Jack
item.description: Jack is a beautiful Ambilobe from our Jude x Alla pairing. When he was young, his yellows were dominant and covered his entire body. However, as he aged, oranges started to creep into his body from his gular and his tail turned a vibrant red. He is a beautiful animal, but that is not the look we are breeding for long-term, aside from his clean blue bars and yellow body.

item.title: Bubbles
item.description: Bubbles is a massive female. At the one year mark, she already weighs 90 grams when receptive. She came from our Jude x Alla pairing and is one of the few females we decided to keep. She’s like a giant version of Alla. Healthy, hungry and bold.

item.title: Button
item.description: Button was a female with nice high contrast barring from Jude x Alla. We bred her a few times before letting her go to make space for fresh genetics, but she was a phenomenal breeder for us! It will be interesting to see how much the high contrast carries into her offspring.

item.title: Blossom
item.description: We got lucky holding back Blossom from Jude x Alla. He looks like a mini-JJ, Alla’s sire, and is a key member of our 3rd generation breeding group. His personality is very similar to Alla’s in that he is very bold and rarely defensive. His yellows are bright and his colors are very vibrant.

item.title: Jude x Alla
item.description: This has been our most successful pairing to-date. Alla is an amazing female Ambilobe that we purchased from RB Barto in 2017. She has been producing clutches between 25-34 eggs every 60 to 90 days ever since! We decided to keep Blossom, Jack, and Afred from this pairing as well as numerous females.

item.title: Alla
item.description: Alla is our most successful female breeder to date. She has a gregarious personality and brings some of the nicest YBBB Kammerflage Kreations lineage into our project via her sire, JJ. We were very lucky to pick her up from Panther Creek Chameleons back in 2017 before JJ was sold to Chromatic Chameleons.

item.title: Lineage: Kammerflage Kreations
item.description: Kammerflage Kreations Manome-toky (Promise Keeper) Sire Bararata-fatio (Bamboo Falcon) Dam Vony-reny Promise keeper Promise keeper1 Promise keeper2 Promise keeper3 Promise keeper4

item.title: Lineage: Panther Creek Chameleons
item.description: Panther Creek JJ Jj Jj1 Jj2 Jj3 Jj4 Jj5 Jj6 Sire Mavo-ra (Yellow Blood) Dam Sire Kely-tongotra (Little Foot) Wet Dream Wetdream
